pages.text: Affects fury spells only. Doubles Fury XP gained on spell-cast, and adds 0.2 flat damage. Affects:$(li)Path of Lethality$(li)Path of the Equinox$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter absorbs your inner fury and channels it through its spells. Imbues onto the Furious Scepter and persists on that scepter's paths.
